item.title: About
item.description:
Hi! I’m Lumi 👩‍💻

A curious and passionate learner, building my own little universe with code!✨

💻 What I’m currently learning 🌱

My skill tree is expanding every day! Here’s what I’m focusing on for work and growth:

  • 🌟 PHP: A flexible backend language, perfect for building functional websites.
  • 🎨 CSS and HTML: Making websites beautiful and alive with style and structure.
  • 📊 PHPSpreadsheet: Handling complex tables and visualizing data like a pro.
  • 🛢️ SQL: Mastering databases and finding the hidden gems of information.
  • 🔧 Learning at full speed – driven by work needs!

I’m also leveling up my language skills:

  • 🇩🇪 German – to tackle everyday challenges and integrate better.
  • 🇺🇸 English – to dive deeper into programming and technology.

✨ My programming journey

Step by step, I’m diving into the vast world of programming, filled with excitement and challenges.
This blog is my personal journal, where I document my growth and share my experiences to inspire others.

  • 💡 Writing and sharing: Helps me deepen my understanding and support fellow learners.
  • 🔄 Organizing knowledge: Breaking down complex concepts in my own words to solidify my skills.

🌈 My vision for the future: Grow together with you!

Programming isn’t just a skill to me – it’s an exciting journey into a world full of endless possibilities!
In the future, I hope to release interesting projects and share my experiences, learning and growing with all of you.

If you’re as passionate about coding and creativity as I am, you’re in the right place.
Let’s explore the world together with code and turn our dreams into reality! 💻✨
